db:abstract.db:para: The example implements a Modbus slave application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += serialbus serialport widgets requires(qtConfig(combobox))
TARGET = modbusslave TEMPLATE = app CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += main.cpp\ mainwindow.cpp \ settingsdialog.cpp
HEADERS += mainwindow.h settingsdialog.h
FORMS += mainwindow.ui settingsdialog.ui
RESOURCES += slave.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/serialbus/modbus/slave INSTALLS += target
